competitors.name: OSIsoft
competitors.notes: Primary competitor, real-time data infrastructure (acquired by AVEVA in 2020)

competitors.name: AVEVA
competitors.notes: Industrial software for engineering and operations

competitors.name: Honeywell
competitors.notes: Process Solutions for oil & gas, refining, chemicals

competitors.name: Seeq
competitors.notes: Advanced analytics for process manufacturing data

context: By 2015, Aspen Technology faced competition from specialized process software vendors (OSIsoft, AVEVA), large automation companies (Honeywell, Schneider, Emerson), and emerging analytics platforms (TrendMiner, Seeq). AspenTech held 9.55% of the EAM market.
